name: Timmy the Cube's NORMAL day at the beach
name_original: Timmy the Cube's NORMAL day at the beach
description:
My submission for: MiniJam50: Islands!

Timmy the cube is a small Rectangular fellow with some neat shades and a... gun?

Timmy is visiting a beach at Cregar Island for his vacation, nothing could go wrong... right?

Features:

Timmy

random civilians

Bad voiceovers (by me)

Horrible, streched out UI

and more! (Just kidding thats it)
